heisig_chinese_memo: The bamboo shoot takes ten days to get through its first stage of growth.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: in the season (旬) for bamboo (⺮) you'll see a bamboo shoot
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pole of the bamboo mop is of course made from a bamboo shoot.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " bamboo ", " Xun ", the original meaning is bamboo shoots. There are inscriptions from the " bamboo ", from " ◎ " from " bamboo " use the word, suspected " shoot " as a name. "Shuowen": "Bamboo embryos. From bamboo, Xunsheng." "Poetry·Daya·Han Yi": "Its Su Weihe, Weisun and Pu." Zheng Xuanjian: "Bamboo shoots are also cute."

" Bamboo shoots " can refer to the ancient horizontal wood on which musical instruments such as bells and chimes were hung. "Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji‧ Ziren": "The Ziren is a bamboo shoot." Han Zhengxuan's note: "In the county of musical instruments, horizontally called bamboo shoots, planted called yams."

" Sun " also means Zhuyu, that is, bamboo sedan chair. "The Fifteen Years of Gongyang Biography-Wengong": "Why do you not speak, but also the words. If you threaten me and return, the bamboo shoots will come." He Xiu's note: "The bamboo shooter, the bamboo basket, an editor. The name north of Qilu is called bamboo shoots."

" Bamboo " also means the green skin of tender bamboo. "Shu‧Gu Ming": "Folding the west to the south, laying heavy bamboo shoots." Kong Chuan: "Bamboo shoots, bamboo shoots." Kong Yingda Shu: ""Shu Cao" says: "Bamboo shoots, bamboo shoots." Sun Yan said: "Bamboo shoots are called bamboo shoots." The bamboo shoots are bamboo shoots, and the skin of the bamboo shoots is used as a table." Lu Deming explained: "Xu Yun: Bamboo and bamboo (may) serve as a table.

" Sun " is also commonly used as " tenon ", which means a tenon. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 42: "(The chair) made the wrong bamboo shoot in two clicks, and it tilted eastward, even the chair with the person was tilted."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " bamboo " and " Xun ", the original meaning is bamboo shoots.
humanum_full_description:
從「竹」，「旬」聲，本義為竹子的嫩芽。金文有從「竹」，從「◎」，從「竹」的用字，疑為「筍」，用作人名。《說文》：「竹胎也。从竹，旬聲。」《詩‧大雅‧韓奕》：「其蔌維何，維筍及蒲。」鄭玄箋：「筍，竹萌也。」

　　「筍」可表示古代懸掛鐘磬鎛等樂器的橫木。《周禮‧考工記‧梓人》：「梓人為筍虡。」漢鄭玄注：「樂器所縣，橫曰筍，植曰虡。」

　　「筍」也表示竹輿，即竹轎。《公羊傳‧文公十五年》：「何以不言來，內辭也。脅我而歸之，筍將而來也。」何休注：「筍者，竹箯，一名編輿。齊魯以北名之曰筍。」

　　「筍」還表示嫩竹的青皮。《書‧顧命》：「西夾南向，敷重筍席。」孔傳：「筍，蒻竹。」孔穎達疏：「《釋草》云：『筍，竹萌。』孫炎曰：『竹初萌生謂之筍。』是筍為蒻竹，取筍竹之皮以為席也。」陸德明釋文：「徐云：竹子竹（可）為席，于貧反。」

　　「筍」還通作「榫」，表示榫頭。《紅樓夢》第42回：「﹝椅子﹞兩下裏錯了筍，向東一歪，連人帶椅子都歪倒了。」
humanum_short_description: 從「竹」，「旬」聲，本義為竹子的嫩芽。

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • ⺮ [ zhú ] bamboo; flute
    • 旬 [ xún ] ten-day period; period of time
①竹子初從土裏長出的嫩莖、芽，又稱“竹筍”，可以做菜喫。可食用者主要有“毛竹筍”、“慈竹筍”、“麻竹筍”等。
②竹子的青皮：筍席(用竹青編成的席子)。
③古同“榫”。
(Simplified: 笋)

從「 竹 」，「 旬 」聲，本義為竹子的嫩芽。金文有從「 竹 」，從「 ◎ 」，從「 竹 」的用字，疑為「 筍 」，用作人名。《說文》：「竹胎也。从竹，旬聲。」《詩‧大雅‧韓奕》：「其蔌維何，維筍及蒲。」鄭玄箋：「筍，竹萌也。」 「 筍 」可表示古代懸掛鐘磬鎛等樂器的橫木。《周禮‧考工記‧梓人》：「梓人為筍虡。」漢鄭玄注：「樂器所縣，橫曰筍，植曰虡。」 「 筍 」也表示竹輿，即竹轎。《公羊傳‧文公十五年》：「何以不言來，內辭也。脅我而歸之，筍將而來也。」何休注：「筍者，竹箯，一名編輿。齊魯以北名之曰筍。」 「 筍 」還表示嫩竹的青皮。《書‧顧命》：「西夾南向，敷重筍席。」孔傳：「筍，蒻竹。」孔穎達疏：「《釋草》云：『筍，竹萌。』孫炎曰：『竹初萌生謂之筍。』是筍為蒻竹，取筍竹之皮以為席也。」陸德明釋文：「徐云：竹子竹（可）為席，于貧反。」 「 筍 」還通作「 榫 」，表示榫頭。《紅樓夢》第42回：「﹝椅子﹞兩下裏錯了筍，向東一歪，連人帶椅子都歪倒了。」
From the sound of " bamboo", " Xun", the original meaning is bamboo shoots. There are inscriptions from the " bamboo", from " ◎" from " bamboo" use the word, suspected " shoot" as a name. "Shuowen": "Bamboo embryos. From bamboo, Xunsheng." "Poetry·Daya·Han Yi": "Its Su Weihe, Weisun and Pu." Zheng Xuanjian: "Bamboo shoots are also cute." " Bamboo shoots" can refer to the ancient horizontal wood on which musical instruments such as bells and chimes were hung. "Zhou Li‧ Kaogongji‧ Ziren": "The Ziren is a bamboo shoot." Han Zhengxuan's note: "In the county of musical instruments, horizontally called bamboo shoots, planted called yams." " Sun" also means Zhuyu, that is, bamboo sedan chair. "The Fifteen Years of Gongyang Biography-Wengong": "Why do you not speak, but also the words. If you threaten me and return, the bamboo shoots will come." He Xiu's note: "The bamboo shooter, the bamboo basket, an editor. The name north of Qilu is called bamboo shoots." " Bamboo" also means the green skin of tender bamboo. "Shu‧Gu Ming": "Folding the west to the south, laying heavy bamboo shoots." Kong Chuan: "Bamboo shoots, bamboo shoots." Kong Yingda Shu: ""Shu Cao" says: "Bamboo shoots, bamboo shoots." Sun Yan said: "Bamboo shoots are called bamboo shoots." The bamboo shoots are bamboo shoots, and the skin of the bamboo shoots is used as a table." Lu Deming explained: "Xu Yun: Bamboo and bamboo (may) serve as a table. " Sun" is also commonly used as " tenon", which means a tenon. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 42: "(The chair) made the wrong bamboo shoot in two clicks, and it tilted eastward, even the chair with the person was tilted."

筍字的基本解释

筍
sǔn
同“笋”。

筍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǔn］
［《廣韻》思尹切，上準，心。］
亦作“箰1”。亦作“笋1”。
(1)竹的嫩芽，可作菜。
(2)古代悬挂钟磬鎛等乐器的横木。
(3)比喻女子的纤手。
(4)通“榫”。枘；榫头。
[②]［xùn］
［《集韻》須閏切，去稕，心。］
竹舆。
[③]［yún］
嫩竹的青皮；蔑青。柔韧性好，可制席。参见“筍3席”。

筍字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筍； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页883第02
〔古文〕??【廣韻】思引切【集韻】聳尹切【正韻】聳允切，?音簨。【說文】竹胎也。【爾雅·釋草】筍，竹萌。【疏】竹初萌生謂之筍。【詩·大雅】其䔩維何，維筍及蒲。【陸璣疏】筍皆四月生，惟巴竹筍八月、九月生。始出地，長數寸，鬻以苦酒、䜴汁浸之，可以就酒及食。【唐書·百官志】司竹監掌植竹、葦，歲以筍供尚食。【本草】竹有雌雄，雌者多筍，於竹根行鞭時，掘取嫩者，謂之鞭筍。冬月掘大竹根下未出土者爲冬筍，?可鮮食，爲珍品。南人淡乾者爲玉版筍、明筍、火筍，鹽曝者爲鹽筍，?可爲蔬食。諸竹筍氣味甘，微寒，無毒。　又縣鐘磬之橫木曰筍，與簨同。【周禮·冬官考工記】梓人爲筍虡。【註】樂器所懸橫曰筍，直曰虡。【疏】筍讀爲竹筍之筍。　又【類篇】於倫切。弱竹，可爲席。【書·顧命】敷重筍席。【傳】筍，蒻竹。徐云：竹子竹爲席。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?須閏切，音峻。竹輿也。【公羊傳·文十五年】齊人歸公孫敖之喪，脅物而歸之，筍將而來也。【註】筍者，竹箯。一名編輿，齊、魯以北名之曰筍

暂无。

Bamboo shoots
Basic explanation of words
Bamboo shoots
sǔn
Same as "bamboo shoots."
Bamboo shoots
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǔn]
["Guangyun" Si Yinqie, quasi, heart. ]
Also known as "箰1". Also known as "Bamboo 1".
(1) The shoots of bamboo can be used as vegetables.
(2) Ancient horizontal woods used to hang musical instruments such as bells and chimes.
(3) It is a metaphor for a woman's slender hands.
(4) Through "tenon".枘; tenon.
[②]［xùn］
["Ji Yun" must be cut, go to the sea, heart. ]
Zhu Yu.
[③]［yún］
The green skin of tender bamboo; Good flexibility, can be used for making seats. See "3 seats with bamboo shoots."
Bamboo shoots
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　 Bamboo; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 883 No. 02
〔古文〕??【Guangyun】Thinking and cutting [Jiyun] Shing Yinqi [Zhengyun] Shinging and cutting, the sound is 簨. [Said the text] bamboo fetus too. 【Erya·Shucao】Bamboo shoots, bamboo shoots. 【Sparse】The bamboo shoots are called bamboo shoots. 【Poetry·Daya】Its wife Weihe, Weisun and Pu. 【Lu Jishu】Bamboo shoots are born in April, but Ba bamboo shoots are born in August and September. It starts from the ground and is several inches long. It is soaked in bitter wine and liquor, and it can be eaten and drink. [Book of Tang·Hundred Officials] Sizhu supervised the planting of bamboo and reeds, and used bamboo shoots for food at the age of the year. 【Materia Medica】Bamboo has males and females, and the females have more shoots. When the roots of the bamboo are whip, the tender ones are digged, which is called whip shoots. Winter bamboo shoots that have not been unearthed under the roots of the big bamboo in the winter months are winter bamboo shoots, which can be eaten fresh and are treasures. Southerners who are dry are jade bamboo shoots, bright bamboo shoots, and fire bamboo shoots; those who are exposed to salt are salted bamboo shoots, which can be used for vegetable food. The bamboo shoots smell sweet, slightly cold, and non-toxic.　The horizontal wood of Zhongqing in Youxian County is called bamboo shoots, which is the same as 簨. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The people of Zi are Sunya. [Note] The suspension of the musical instrument is called bamboo shoots horizontally, and ya straightly. 【Sparse】The bamboo shoot is read as the shoot of bamboo shoots.　[Classes] Yu Lunqie. Weak bamboo can be used as a seat. 【Book·Gu Ming】Relay the bamboo shoots. [Biography] Bamboo shoots, 蒻竹. Xu Yun: Bamboo and bamboo are the seats.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Rhyme]? Must run cut, sound is severe. Bamboo Yu also. [The Fifteenth Year of the Story of Gongyang] The Qi people returned to the funeral of Gongsun Ao, the threatened things returned, and the bamboo shoots would come. [Note] Bamboo shoots, bamboo baskets. An editor, named bamboo shoots north of Qi and Lu
